protocol.text: Data were RMA-normalized using R (v.2.11) and filterd by p_value 0.05. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA
Seeds of each genotype were surface sterilized with 70% ethanol followed by 2 % sodium hypochloride with repeated rinses with dd-water, and were grown in MS media for ten days.
Trizol extraction of total RNA of whole seedlings was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions followed by cleanup using the Qiagen RNA mini kit.
Biotinylated aRNA were prepared according to the revised 3' IVT Affymetrix protocol from 500ng total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of aRNA were hybridized for 16 h at 450C on ATH1 Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Gene Chip Scanner 3300.
